page.title: 14Shopping Habits in Haddenham
page.content: Most people in Haddenham prefer to go to Aylesbury for their main shopping as there are{good parking facilities and{large shops.}Some people prefer Thame which is nearer, but without such good facilities. A lot of people never shop in Haddenham. Before{most people had cars}the majority of shopping was done in Haddenham, but now people only shop in the village for necessities and go further afield for larger items like furniture and clothes. In the nineteenth century there were dressmakers, pedlars, cobblers, blacksmiths and farmers. Now more people work in towns and are prepared to{travel further to shop.
